```{r}
# kategorik değişkenler de bar plot kullanılır
df <- diamonds
glimpse(df)

ggplot(df, aes(cut)) +
    geom_bar()

ggplot(df, aes(cut, fill = color)) +
    geom_bar(position = position_dodge()) +
    ggtitle('Cut an color') +
    xlab('Kesim') +
    ylab('Adet')

```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(price)) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 1000)

ggplot(df, aes(price)) +
    geom_density()

ggplot(df, aes(price)) +
    geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..)) +
    geom_density(alpha = .3, fill = 'orange')

ggplot(df, aes(price, fill = cut)) +
    geom_histogram()

ggplot(df, aes(price)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_grid(cut ~.)
```

```{r}
library(ggridges)
ggplot(df, aes(x = price, y = cut, fill = cut)) +
    geom_density_ridges() +
    theme_ridges() + 
    theme(legend.position = 'none')
```

```{r}
glimpse(iris)

df <- iris
ggplot(df, aes(Sepal.Length , Sepal.Width)) +
    geom_point(size = 2,
               shape = 25,
               stroke = 1,
               color = 'black',
               fill = 'orange') +
    geom_smooth( color = 'red')

ggplot(df, aes(Sepal.Length , Sepal.Width, color = Species, shape = Species)) +
    geom_point(size = 5,
               alpha = 0.5)

ggplot(df, aes(Sepal.Length , Sepal.Width, color = Petal.Length, size = Petal.Length)) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.5)


```
```{r}
df <- mtcars
glimpse(df)

ggplot(df, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_text(label = rownames(df),
              nudge_x = 0.25,
              nudge_y = 0.25,
              check_overlap = T)

ggplot(df, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, fill = cyl)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_label(label = rownames(df),
              nudge_x = 0.25,
              nudge_y = 0.25,
              check_overlap = T) + 
    geom_smooth(method = lm, se = F)



```

```{r}
library(ggExtra)
g <- ggplot(df, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, fill = cyl)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_label(label = rownames(df),
              nudge_x = 0.25,
              nudge_y = 0.25,
              check_overlap = T) + 
    geom_smooth(method = lm, se = F)

ggMarginal(g, type = 'histogram', fill = 'slateblue')

```
